content: easy vanilla hat a simple plain vanilla hat for anyone you start with a knit 2 purl 2 rib then go to plain stockinette in the round and decrease for the top one size fits most easy-smeazy materials this pattern was written using malabrigo vientos you will need 1 skein vientos 130 yards per 100g skein 100% superwash wool hand wash dry flat needles us 16 circular size #9 and #10 us 32 size #10 for magic loop at the top of the hat stitch marker for beginning of round and a tapestry needle to sew in the ends using a us #9 needle cast on 80 stitches using your favorite cast on method i used a long tail cast on join in the round being careful not to twist your stitches place marker at the beginning of the round round 1 *k2 p2* repeat to marker continue round 1 until you have 1 5 you can continue to 2 5 if you want to turn the brim up around your ears change to the us #10 needle knit all rounds until you have 7 5 from the cast on edge or 8 5 for the folded brim slip marker as you come to it start decreases round 1 *k8 k2tog* repeat to bor marker round 2 knit one round round 3 *k7 k2tog* repeat to bor marker round 4 knit to the end of the round round 5 *k6 k2tog* repeat to bor marker round 6 knit to the end of the round round 7 *k5 k2tog* repeat to bor marker round 8 knit to the end of the round round 9 *k4 k2tog* repeat to bor marker round 9 *k3 k2tog* repeat to bor marker round 9 *k2 k2tog* repeat to bor marker round 9 *k1 k2tog* repeat to bor marker round 10 k2tog all the way to the marker cut yarn leaving an 8 tail use the tail to pull through the live stitches twice closing the top of the hat weave in this end and the starting end wear or gift with love abbreviations k knit p purl k2tog knit 2 stitches together m marker bor beginning of round co cast on bobble bind off designed by andrea riddle the yarn club © andrea riddle
